meanings.sent1: The rose bush with the stemmiest branches grew the tallest.
meanings.sent2: The tree in the forest was the stemmiest of them all.
meanings.sent3: The stemmiest plant in the garden seemed to wave at the other flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her bouquet was the stemmiest, standing out among the rest like a tower.
meanings.sent5: The stemmiest vine in the jungle twisted and turned, reaching for the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: In the garden, the tallest sunflower proudly displayed its stemmiest.
meanings.sent2: The oak tree's stemmiest was admired by all who passed by.
meanings.sent3: The stemmiest of the family's pumpkin patch was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The stemmiest of all the rivers wound its way through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The stemmiest of the mountains stood majestically against the sky.
